tool_description: This API gives developers and educators access to our questions via APIs calls. You get free access to over 6,000 past questions for UTME, WASSCE, POST-UTME
name: Nigeria Past Questions
title: Nigeria Past Questions

api_list.name: Aquestion
api_list.description: Add a subject as a parameter eg. chemistry and you get a question when you call this endpoint

api_list.name: Yearsavailableforasubject
api_list.description: Get all years available for a subject
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-past-questions2.p.rapidapi.com/api/metrics/years-available-for/english"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-past-questions2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Severalquestions
api_list.description: Get several questions (limit 40). For example you can get 7 qeuestions for a subject

api_list.name: Manyquestions
api_list.description: Get many questions (returns 40 questions) for a subject

api_list.name: Subjectsavailableforayear
api_list.description: Get all the subjects available for a year

api_list.name: TotalAPIcallsevermade
api_list.description: Get total API calls ever made
api_list.code:

api_list.name: AquestionbyID
